channel.title: Ever wonder about How Stuff Works?
channel.description:
Ever wonder about How Stuff Works? Like the microwave, refrigerator, computer, radio, stereos, cassette players, CD players, DVD players?
I have, and before today I wasn't really into learning about stuff like that, until I was kind of bored. So I went www.howstuffworks.com and it's just such a good site. I've been there before, but I never really cared until I searched for some things that I didn't understand. I didn't know how a microwave worked, so I searched for that. Microwaves generate radio waves at 2500khrtz to excite atoms to generate heat in food.
That's pretty interesting. Well, for all the people who do want to know how stuff works, go to the website! (This sounds a little corny) Learning can be fun! :D lol

@Zach1188 wrote:

Heh it’s pretty cool. This is the first time I’ve seen it (yes I’m a loser ). I am reading about CD’s/CD players and it’s pretty interesting.
